summary: An Ordinance authorizing the operation of cars by a motorman only on each car on a certain portion of the route operated under the provisions of Ordinance No. 480 of the City of Ballard and also Ordinance No. 5874 of the City of Seattle, and also authorizing such operation from the Fremont car barn of Puget Sound Traction, Light & Power Company to such portion of such route and from such portion of such route to the Fremont car barn.
